text: Disney Pixar's Incredibles 2 sneak peek trailer debuted during the 2018 winter Olympics! The highly - anticipated movie is scheduled to hit theaters June 2018, one year earlier than originally planned. Samuel L. Jackson has returned to voice Lucius Best / Frozone, Holly Hunter is back to voice Helen Parr / Elastigirl and Craig T. Nelson has returned to voice Mr. Incredible once again.
